errors.cannotFulfillRequest: I am unable to fulfill this request.

mcp.unavailableMessage:
I apologize, but our AI services are currently unavailable. This may be due to:

• System maintenance
• Network connectivity issues
• Server overload

Please try again in a few minutes. For immediate assistance, you can:
• Contact IT Helpdesk: ext. 1234
• Contact HR: ext. 5678

Thank you for your patience.

errors.notConfigured: I'm sorry, but the security system is not yet configured. Please contact the administrator to enable this feature.
errors.serviceUnavailable: I am sorry, but the security verification system is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
